tweet: The IOTA Foundation is proud to announce the public beta release of the Trinity Desktop Wallet!  https://t.co/Bf9yghiUCU #iota #trinity #wallet

Incredibly proud of the #IOTA Foundation team releasing the #Trinity wallet for Desktop. Now you can securely and easily store, send and receive IOTA tokens on mobile and desktop. Download it from here:  https://t.co/ISJs1GgbOq

IOTA Trinity desktop beta is out!  #IOTA is developing slowly but incredibly steady towards the IoT standard, which @Fujitsu_DE mentioned yesterday.  Next milestones: local snapshots, permanodes, swarm client, Qubic, Coordicide.   Amazing times!  https://t.co/2dI5snV5vG  https://t.co/OX4GSmCBAO

I started as an interested trader in 2012.  Now I want to see if the vision of #IOTA becomes reality.  The next years will be overwhelmingly exciting considering that we talk about the fourth industrial revolution and a new age: the information-age that will improve everything.

Meet my latest project. The Full #IOTA #Rock64 with a screen to show the statistics. An Orange Pi One will be used to show the desktop. All hooked up by a tiny circuit board. Next thing: Wiring it up! Maybe soon for sale at #Rock64Iota?  https://t.co/japo070fxc
